name: inkeep
title: Inkeep
description: Interact with Inkeep Completions API to get AI-powered answers from your knowledge base.
author: user_55

commands.name: ask-inkeep
commands.title: Inkeep
commands.description: Get an answer from Inkeep using your knowledge base.

tools.name: inkeep
tools.title: Inkeep
tools.description: Get a response from Inkeep which indexes private documentation.

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: Model
preferences.description: The Inkeep model to use (e.g., inkeep-qa-sonnet-3-5, inkeep-qa-gpt-4o)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
